column3: Latest;Kompong Speu: A man who was soon to become a groom soon died after leaving his engagement party to go home.------The incident occurred on May 5
column8: Kompong Speu Province.------A provincial police source said that the victim was Sin Hieng
column13: Kampong Speu province. The 20-year-old bride is a factory worker.------According to the Inspector
column15: the victim held an engagement party at the house of his fiancee
column16: a left on his motorbike to go home.------On the way there was a sudden thunderstorm and the man was struck by lightning and died instantly. Two other young people travelling with him suffered no injuries.------ ------https://kbn.news/archives/122399
